skills.name: SRE Definition
skills.pattern: Software engineering approach to operations, Google origin

skills.name: SRE vs DevOps
skills.pattern: SRE implements DevOps, class implements interface

skills.name: Toil Reduction
skills.pattern: Automate repetitive work, free time for engineering

skills.name: SLI
skills.pattern: Measurable metric: latency, error rate, throughput

skills.name: SLO
skills.pattern: Target for SLI: 99.9% availability, p99 < 200ms

skills.name: SLA
skills.pattern: Contract with consequences, SLO + business terms

skills.name: Error Budget
skills.pattern: 100% - SLO = budget for risk, deploy if budget remains

skills.name: Error Budget Policy
skills.pattern: Freeze features if budget exhausted, focus on reliability

skills.name: Four Golden Signals
skills.pattern: Latency, Traffic, Errors, Saturation

skills.name: RED Method
skills.pattern: Rate, Errors, Duration for request-driven services

skills.name: USE Method
skills.pattern: Utilization, Saturation, Errors for resources

skills.name: Alerting Philosophy
skills.pattern: Alert on symptoms, not causes, actionable alerts only

skills.name: Alert Fatigue
skills.pattern: Reduce noise, tune thresholds, meaningful alerts

skills.name: Runbooks
skills.pattern: Step-by-step remediation, linked from alerts

skills.name: Incident Management
skills.pattern: Roles: IC, comms, ops. Severity levels, escalation

skills.name: Incident Commander
skills.pattern: Coordinate response, delegate, communicate status

skills.name: Blameless Postmortems
skills.pattern: Focus on systems, not people, action items

skills.name: Postmortem Template
skills.pattern: Summary, timeline, impact, root cause, action items

skills.name: On-Call Practices
skills.pattern: Rotations, escalation, compensation, sustainable

skills.name: On-Call Handoff
skills.pattern: Document ongoing issues, context transfer

skills.name: Capacity Planning
skills.pattern: Forecast growth, provision ahead, load testing

skills.name: Performance Modeling
skills.pattern: Load curves, bottleneck analysis, scaling models

skills.name: Reliability Patterns
skills.pattern: Redundancy, graceful degradation, isolation

skills.name: Failure Domains
skills.pattern: Isolate failures, limit impact, bulkheads

skills.name: Disaster Recovery
skills.pattern: RTO/RPO, backup strategies, DR drills

skills.name: SRE Automation
skills.pattern: Self-healing, auto-scaling, infrastructure as code

skills.name: Deployment Automation
skills.pattern: Canary, blue-green, progressive rollout, rollback

skills.name: Production Readiness
skills.pattern: Review before launch, monitoring, runbooks, capacity

skills.name: 50% Rule
skills.pattern: 50% ops, 50% development, maintain balance

skills.name: Reliability Culture
skills.pattern: Shared responsibility, embed SRE, training
